title: OXO Colander - Stainless Steel
description: Get a grip on pasta with OXO’s Stainless Steel Colander. Its broad, soft handles are comfortable and non-slip to provide a firm grip when you shake the Colander to drain water. Non-slip feet keep the Colander steady in the sink. This attractive brushed stainless steel Colander can double as a fruit bowl in the dining room too.

asset.author: OXOGoodGrips
asset.hookText: http://www.oxo.com/p-386-colander-stainless-steel.aspx Get a grip on pasta with OXO's Stainless Steel Colander. Its broad, soft handles are comfortable and ...

transcripts:
Whether you're washing a handful of fruits and vegetables, or draining a whole pot of pasta, our stainless steel colander is beautifully finished, and quick to drain. 

Our colander's broad, soft handles are comfortable and non-slip to provide a firm grip when you shake the colander to drain water. Non-slip feet keep the colander steady in the sink. 

The four-quart capacity is large enough to drain a pot of pasta, or rinse large batches of grapes, berries, or spinach. The attractive, brushed stainless steel colander can double as a fruit bowl in the dining room, as well. 

Here's a good tip. You can also use your colander as the splatter shield when frying. Simply top the pan with an upside-down metal colander to protect yourself from burns, while still allowing heat to escape.
